Reviews.Title: “first time in rome”

Reviews.Content: fantastic stay hotel warm friendly hotel staff excellent especially tips choice offer breakfast lots pastries waitress bring recommend hotel likes walk 20minutes vatican walls

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic stay”
Reviews.Author: Tony N
Reviews.Content: staying hotel weekend nice reception assigned told newly furnished spacious nice amenities nespresso coffee etc bathroom nice terrace travelling partner enjoyed moment stay breakfast totally satisfactory

Reviews.Content: rest head average hotel fancy elevators slow 2 people wluggage time luggage fit 4 thats hotel breakfast assortment pastries beverages bacon eggs

Reviews.Title: “It’s not a 4 stars hotel without a renovation in the rooms!!”
Reviews.Author: albyIMF
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel weekend october 2011 hotel located below hill near headquarters rai hotel officially 4 stars hotel elevator can’t immediately … hasn’t door renovation … check horrible door effectively door spacious furniture sensation furniture renovated door hotel nice terrace roof divided 2 left nice sofa low table tables chairs please renovate terrace terrace below hill nice view breakfast nice lot food meet italian tv famous people hotel 4 star hotel renovation

Reviews.Title: “Authentic Charming Italian Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Rocks_to_travel
Reviews.Content: chance stay hotel rome september 2011 hotel located residential directly north vatican hotel frequented primarily italians nonitalian tourists hotel hotel quiet street unassuming front staff friendly speak english perfectly probably languages sized available am aware stayed couch private patio overlooking street clean appointed typical european manner internet wifi available hotel 4 euroday continental style breakfast includes breads pastries cold meats fruit scrambled eggs ham am restaurant checked rooftop patio 20 30 main level bar 7pm main level lots couches seating space lobby location convenient main tourist attractions except vatican vatican approximately 20 minute walk otherwise coliseum hour walk taxi ride approximately 1215 euros gates coliseum walking fitness regime fitness centre am aware hotel highly recommend hotel avoid touristy hotels 110 worth

Reviews.Title: “great hotel, amazing location and helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: vrotelli
Reviews.Content: impressed service hotel located close proximity landmarks rome staff curtious helpful knowledgable loved breakfast start day foot favorite hotels european excursion recommend balcony beauty rome
